title: Cell Culture Seeding - 384 Wells
author: Opentrons
process:
Aspirate ‘Matrigel + cell’ mix from one of the wells of 12 row trough using the p50 8 channel pipette
Dispense 10 µl/well in the whole 384 well plate (hopefully aspirate 50 µl using p50 8 channel pipette and multi-dispense 10 µl/well)

markdown.title: Cell Culture Seeding - 384 Wells
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.process:
1. Aspirate ‘Matrigel + cell’ mix from one of the wells of 12 row trough using the p50 8 channel pipette
2. Dispense 10 µl/well in the whole 384 well plate (hopefully aspirate 50 µl using p50 8 channel pipette and multi-dispense 10 µl/well)
